{{disambig-more: '''Fíriel''' was, at one stage in the writing of the [[Númenor]] myth, a [[Númenóreans
Fíriel: Númenórean]] maiden, daughter of [[Orontor]], of the household of [[Elendil]]. She was remembered for singing a sad song in [[Quenya]] for Elendil and [[Herendil]], beginning with "''Ilu Ilúvatar en káre''" ("The Father made the World").<ref name=P1>{{LR
